Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to business protection for point-of-sale equipment leases
Summary: Enacts provisions relating to the lease of credit card terminals; requires disclosures; prohibits certain practices.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to business protection for point-of-sale equipment leases
